Drinks.description: A milkshake is a creamy, cold beverage made by blending milk, ice cream, and flavorings like chocolate, vanilla, or fruit. It’s often topped with whipped cream, syrup, or sprinkles for extra sweetness. Popular variations include chocolate milkshake, strawberry milkshake, banana milkshake, and Oreo milkshake. It’s a refreshing and indulgent treat, perfect for hot days!
Drinks.title: milk shake

Drinks.description: Falooda is a rich and refreshing Indian dessert drink made with rose syrup, vermicelli, basil seeds (sabja), milk, and ice cream. It is often topped with nuts, jelly, or fruit for extra flavor and texture.
Drinks.title: Faluda

Drinks.description: A mojito is a refreshing Cuban cocktail made with lime, mint, sugar, soda water, and white rum. It has a zesty, minty, and slightly sweet flavor, perfect for hot weather.
Drinks.title: mojitho

Drinks.description: A smoothie is a thick, creamy beverage made by blending fruits, vegetables, yogurt, milk, or juice. It’s a healthy and refreshing drink, often enjoyed as a snack or breakfast.
Drinks.title: smoothies

Drinks.description: A chocolate milkshake is a creamy, indulgent treat made by blending chocolate ice cream, milk, and chocolate syrup. It’s a rich, sweet beverage often topped with whipped cream, chocolate chips, or sprinkles for extra decadence
Drinks.title: Chocolate Milk Shake

Drinks.description: Juice is a liquid beverage made by extracting the natural liquid from fruits, vegetables, or herbs. It’s a refreshing drink, often enjoyed as a breakfast drink or a healthy snack.
Drinks.title: Juice

Items.description: Cake is a sweet baked dessert made from flour, sugar, eggs, butter, and leavening agents like baking powder
Items.title: Cake

Items.description: Sushi is a traditional Japanese dish made with vinegared rice, often paired with raw or cooked seafood, vegetables, and seaweed
Items.title: Sushi

Items.description: Butter chicken (Murgh Makhani) is a popular Indian dish made with marinated chicken cooked in a rich
Items.title: Butter Chicken

Items.description: A burger is a sandwich consisting of a cooked patty, usually made from beef, chicken, or plant-based alternatives
Items.title: burger

Salad.description: A chia seed salad is a nutritious and refreshing dish that combines the superfood benefits of chia seeds with fresh vegetables, fruits.
Salad.title: chia seed salad

Salad.description: A fruit salad is a refreshing dish made with a mix of fresh fruits like strawberries, bananas, apples, grapes, oranges, and berries. It can be served plain or dressed with honey, yogurt, citrus juice, or a sweet syrup. Fruit salads are perfect as a healthy snack, dessert, or breakfast option.
Salad.title: fruit salad

Salad.description: A Meat Salad is a hearty dish that combines cooked or cured meats like grilled chicken, beef, ham, or bacon with fresh vegetables, leafy greens, and dressings. Popular variations include grilled chicken Caesar salad, Thai beef salad, and ham and cheese salad. It can be served warm or cold and is often topped with cheese, nuts, or croutons for extra flavor and texture.
Salad.title: Meet salad

Salad.description: A kiwi salad is a refreshing and vibrant dish featuring kiwi as the star ingredient, often paired with other fruits, greens, or even proteins.
Salad.title: kiwi salad

Salad.description: A Berry Salad is a fresh and vibrant dish made with a mix of berries like strawberries, blueberries, raspberries, and blackberries. It’s often paired with leafy greens like spinach or arugula and topped with ingredients like nuts, cheese (like feta or goat cheese), and a light honey or balsamic dressing. It’s a refreshing and nutritious option for a side dish or light meal.
Salad.title: Barry salad

Salad.description: A paper salad with fruit sounds like a creative or decorative dish! If you're referring to an actual edible salad, it could be a light and refreshing mix of thinly sliced (paper-thin) fruits like apples, pears, and oranges, combined with greens and a citrus dressing.
Salad.title: paper and salt salad

totel.description: Fried rice is a flavorful and versatile dish made by stir-frying cooked rice with vegetables, protein (like chicken, shrimp, or tofu), and seasonings. It’s often cooked with soy sauce and can include extras like eggs, garlic, onions, peas, carrots, or green onions.
totel.title: Fried Rice

totel.description: Kottu Roti is a popular Sri Lankan street food made by stir-frying chopped flatbread (roti) with vegetables, meat (like chicken or beef), eggs, and spices. The dish is known for its bold flavors and unique texture, combining crispy and soft elements.
totel.title: Kottu Roti

totel.description: Pancakes are soft, fluffy breakfast treats made from a batter of flour, eggs, milk, sugar, and baking powder. The batter is poured onto a hot griddle or skillet and cooked until golden brown. They are usually stacked and served with a variety of toppings like butter, syrup, fresh fruits, whipped cream, or nuts.
totel.title: PanCake

totel.description: Sushi is a traditional Japanese dish consisting of vinegared rice, often paired with a variety of ingredients such as raw fish (like tuna or salmon), seaweed (nori), vegetables, and occasionally fruit. Sushi comes in different forms, with some of the most common being nigiri (slices of fish on rice), maki (rolled sushi wrapped in seaweed), and sashimi (sliced raw fish without rice).
totel.title: Sushi

totel.description: Pizza is a beloved dish made with a round, flat base of dough, typically topped with tomato sauce, cheese, and various toppings like meats, vegetables, and herbs. It’s then baked in an oven until the crust is golden and the cheese is melted.
totel.title: Pizza

totel.description: Spaghetti is a type of long, thin pasta originating from Italy, typically made from wheat flour and water. It’s a staple in Italian cuisine and is usually served with a variety of sauces, such as tomato sauce, meatballs, pesto, or carbonara.
totel.title: spaghetti
